House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00438
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING NESTHY PETECIO FOR WINNING THE GOLD MEDAL IN THE 2019 AIBA WOMEN'S WORLD BOXING CHAMPIONSHIPS HELD IN ULAN-UDE, RUSSIA
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VELASCO, LORD ALLAN JAY Q.
DATE FILED : 2019-10-15
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated by a Subcommittee on 2019-12-17
          -The body approved the consolidation of HR Nos. 427, 429, 432, 435, 437, 445, 451, 461, 466, 478, 498, and 515
          -Consideration and Adoption of Measures on HR Nos. 427, 429, 432, 435, 437, 445, 451, 461, 466, 478, 498, and 515 (commending Carlos Edriel Yulo for winning the gold medal in the 49th Federation Internationale De Gymnastique World Artistic Championship
      2. Committee Report filed on 2020-02-05
          -House Committee Report No. 219 on HR 697
      3. Approved for Inclusion in the Calendar of Business on 2020-02-05
          -Adopted as Resolution No. HR00045 on 2020-02-19
MOTHER BILL: HR00697
